class.name: LeaderboardsClient
class.brief_description: Node for connecting to the Lobby service leaderboard module.
class.description: Node for connecting to the Lobby service leaderboard module. In order to use it, set the [member game_id] to the same as you use in the [LobbyClient].

method.name: request_leaderboard
method.description: Requests the leaderboard data for the given leaderboard ID. Returns a [LeaderboardResponse] object that has a [signal LeaderboardResponse.finished] signal that is emitted when finished.

method.name: request_user_score_and_rank
method.description: Requests the leaderboard data for the given user and leaderboard ID. Returns a [LeaderboardResponse] object that has a [signal LeaderboardResponse.finished] signal that is emitted when finished.

members.member: The game ID to use for the leaderboard requests. It should match the one used in the [LobbyClient].
The HTTP prefix to use for the requests. It should be either "http://" or "https://". Defaults to "https://".
The server URL to use for the requests. Defaults to "leaderboards.appsinacup.com". You can set this to a custom URL if you are running your own leaderboard server.

signal.name: log_updated
signal.description: Signals a log from a command.
